thread.title: DC Download: Steve Case's Big Check for Baltimore, 50 on Fire Tickets
thread.title_full: DC Download: Steve Case's Big Check for Baltimore, 50 on Fire Tickets

author: Eric Hal Schwartz
title: DC Download: Steve Case's Big Check for Baltimore, 50 on Fire Tickets
text:
Image via Rise of the Rest Hackers love hotels 
McLean, Va.-based Hilton Hotels is frantically investigating a financial breach orchestrated by an unnamed group of hackers, which has allegedly enabled criminals to steal customer credit card information from point-of-sale machines. As the hospitality and cybersecurity industries deal with this new information, questions linger regarding the state of cybersecurity at these massive hotel and resort franchises. Chris Bing explains why hackers love hotels . Steve Case writes a big check for a Baltimore startup 
Steve Case presented an over-sized $100K check to Baltimore-based health tech startup Sisu Global Health on Monday. The female-led company was the first winner of his latest Rise of the Rest bus tour in Baltimore. Out of a field full of health tech startups, he and the rest of the stacked judges panel picked Sisu as a real world-changer, capable of saving millions of lives. Find out more about how Case plans to level the playing field for everyone in our full story here . DC's best journalism schools 
D.C. has a lot of great journalists, and is producing more all the time. No surprise then that four local universities made it into the rankings of top 20 journalism programs nationwide. Find out how D.C. ranked in Ryan Ferguson's full story here . 50 on Fire tickets for sale 
50 on Fire is coming back and tickets are now on sale. Find out how to nominate your favorite innovators in the DMV and join us for a fantastic celebration of the people and organizations driving our city forward. Check out all the details and buy your tickets for Dec. 10 here . All the tech news in D.C. you need to know.
